title: Stable Ender Pearl
description: While Stable Ender Pearls are used in various crafting recipes they also have a purpose on their own. When you you right click a stable ender pearl in your hand it will be bound to you. When it's dropped on the ground it will teleport the player it's bound to to itself after 7 seconds. If it's not bound to anyone it will instead teleport a random entity in a 10 block radius to itself.

title: Water Walking Boots
description: Allows you to walk on water! Press Shift to go below the surface

title: Ectoplasm
description: Dropped from Spirits when killed. Used to create Spectre items

title: Position Filter
description: Stores the XYZ coordinates of a block when right clicked. Highlights bound block in purple.

title: Redstone Activator
description: Creates a redstone signal on a block when right clicked.

title: Weather Egg
description: When thrown, will create whatever weather effect the egg has: Clear, Rain, Storm

title: Super Lubricent Stone
description: Super slippery stone, when an entity moves on this, it lose all friction
